message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $7,500 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $7,000? I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
